alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Montgomery County through 800 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Havana, or near Caney, and a second strong thunderstorm near Coffeyville moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Cherryvale, Caney, Dearing, Tyro, Liberty, Havana, Bolton, Elk City Lake, Elk City State Park, Independence Airport and Coffeyville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
